item.title: An encounter with blogdown
item.description: An encounter with web content related to R, although for me it is usually random, is in general welcoming. The link to this amazing feature building on the fact that using a markdown language is rather a pleasant way to write a blog post in a fully costumizable website all by yourself is enticing, to me at least. I started weaving thoughts right at the moment.
